history.proof: intros d sigma Href Hcorrect. unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [p a]. hauto lq: on use: DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar, dta_states_non_empty_lazy_eg_dta_states_non_empty unfold: DTA_ref_ok inv: DTA.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature Href : DTA_ref_ok (dta p a) Hcorrect : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma Unable to unify "match DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty ?M1854) ?M1854 with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end" with "match match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end".

In environment H : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> DTA_ref_ok (DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty d) d) p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature Href : preDTA_ref_ok p Hcorrect : predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma s : state Heqo : MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a = Some s Unable to unify "preDTA_ref_ok p" with "preDTA_ref_ok (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment H : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> DTA_ref_ok (DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty d) d) p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature Href : preDTA_ref_ok p Hcorrect : predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma Heqo : MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a = None Unable to unify "predta_correct_wrt_sign p sigma" with "preDTA_ref_ok (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list))".

original: intros d sigma Href Hcorrect. unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [p a]. simpl. apply DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar. - apply Href. - apply Hcorrect.
